instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0044 and 0.027, r - i > 0.43, and r-band magnitude < 18.11.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0044 AND 0.027 AND (p.r - p.i) > 0.43 AND p.r < 18.11

instruction: List galaxies with type = 3 and redshift < 0.0432 with r-band Petrosian radius > 9.17.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND p.type = 3 AND s.z < 0.0432 AND p.petroR90_r > 9.17

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0129 and 0.0405, r - i > 0.32, and u-band magnitude < 20.73.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0129 AND 0.0405 AND (p.r - p.i) > 0.32 AND p.u < 20.73

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0063 and 0.0359, r - i > 0.38, and g-band magnitude < 20.79.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0063 AND 0.0359 AND (p.r - p.i) > 0.38 AND p.g < 20.79

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0044 and 0.0325, g - r > 0.85, and i-band magnitude < 17.6.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0044 AND 0.0325 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.85 AND p.i < 17.6

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift < 0.0496, g - r color > 0.69, and extinction in g-band less than 0.6.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.extinction_g, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.0496 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.69 AND p.extinction_g < 0.6

instruction: Retrieve galaxies that are likely AGN hosts based on color (g-r > 0.65) and concentration index > 2.88, with redshift less than 0.256.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, (p.petroR90_r/p.petroR50_r) AS concentration, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.256 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.65 AND (p.petroR90_r/p.petroR50_r) > 2.88

instruction: List galaxies with type = 6 and redshift < 0.0464 with r-band Petrosian radius > 9.28.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND p.type = 6 AND s.z < 0.0464 AND p.petroR90_r > 9.28

instruction: Find galaxies in a rectangular region from RA=135.2329 to 135.8859 and DEC=46.6342 to 47.2762, with redshift < 0.16 and g - r > 0.52.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM PhotoObj AS p
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.16
AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.52
AND p.ra BETWEEN 135.2329 AND 135.8859
AND p.dec BETWEEN 46.6342 AND 47.2762

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0029 and 0.0174, r - i > 0.86, and r-band magnitude < 19.62.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0029 AND 0.0174 AND (p.r - p.i) > 0.86 AND p.r < 19.62

instruction: Find galaxies within 10.2 arcminutes of RA=153.0213 and DEC=-4.0807 with g - r > 0.6 and redshift < 0.16.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM fGetNearbyObjEq(153.0213, -4.0807, 0.17) AS n
JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON p.objID = n.objID
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.6 AND s.z < 0.16

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0068 and 0.0171, r - i > 0.61, and z-band magnitude < 18.79.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0068 AND 0.0171 AND (p.r - p.i) > 0.61 AND p.z < 18.79

instruction: Find galaxies within 11.28 arcminutes of RA=163.0 and DEC=29.9575 with g - r > 0.48 and redshift < 0.25.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM fGetNearbyObjEq(163.0, 29.9575, 0.188) AS n
JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON p.objID = n.objID
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.48 AND s.z < 0.25

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift < 0.355 and g - r color greater than 0.62.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.355 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.62

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift < 0.0493, i - z color > 1.02, and extinction in g-band less than 0.76.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.extinction_g, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.0493 AND (p.i - p.z) > 1.02 AND p.extinction_g < 0.76

instruction: Find galaxies in a rectangular region from RA=153.1249 to 153.7449 and DEC=7.8006 to 8.4186, with redshift < 0.157 and g - r > 0.57.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM PhotoObj AS p
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.157
AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.57
AND p.ra BETWEEN 153.1249 AND 153.7449
AND p.dec BETWEEN 7.8006 AND 8.4186

instruction: List clean photometric galaxies with z-band magnitude < 19.4 and redshift < 0.0375.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.clean, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND p.clean = 1 AND p.z < 19.4 AND s.z < 0.0375

instruction: Find galaxies in a rectangular region from RA=197.5 to 198.005 and DEC=56.6543 to 57.1573, with redshift < 0.043 and g - r > 0.63.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM PhotoObj AS p
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.043
AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.63
AND p.ra BETWEEN 197.5 AND 198.005
AND p.dec BETWEEN 56.6543 AND 57.1573

output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.extinction_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.014 AND (p.g - p.r) > 1.08 AND p.extinction_r < 0.8

instruction: Find galaxies in a rectangular region from RA=247.8704 to 248.6014 and DEC=33.9439 to 34.9189, with redshift < 0.188 and g - r > 0.76.

AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.76
AND p.ra BETWEEN 247.8704 AND 248.6014

instruction: Find AGN candidates with subclass indicating AGN and g - r color above 0.55, limited to redshift < 0.133.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' AND s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.133 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.55

instruction: Find galaxies within 20.76 arcminutes of RA=153.8958 and DEC=25.3644 with g - r > 0.48 and redshift < 0.199.

JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON p.objID = n.objID
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.48 AND s.z < 0.199

output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0093 AND 0.0272 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.54 AND p.u < 17.35

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift < 0.0103, i - z color > 0.82, and extinction in z-band less than 0.7.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.extinction_z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.0103 AND (p.i - p.z) > 0.82 AND p.extinction_z < 0.7

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0173 and 0.0279, r - i > 0.86, and i-band magnitude < 17.83.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0173 AND 0.0279 AND (p.r - p.i) > 0.86 AND p.i < 17.83

instruction: Retrieve galaxies that are likely AGN hosts based on color (g-r > 0.71) and concentration index > 2.62, with redshift less than 0.269.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, (p.petroR90_r/p.petroR50_r) AS concentration, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.269 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.71 AND (p.petroR90_r/p.petroR50_r) > 2.62

instruction: Find galaxies within 20.52 arcminutes of RA=207.8896 and DEC=10.9717 with g - r > 0.84 and redshift < 0.25.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM fGetNearbyObjEq(207.8896, 10.9717, 0.342) AS n
JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON p.objID = n.objID
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.84 AND s.z < 0.25

instruction: List galaxies with type = 6 and redshift < 0.0141 with r-band Petrosian radius > 9.65.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND p.type = 6 AND s.z < 0.0141 AND p.petroR90_r > 9.65

output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, (p.petroR90_r/p.petroR50_r) AS concentration, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.404 AND (p.g - p.r) > 1.14 AND (p.petroR90_r/p.petroR50_r) > 2.85

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift between 0.0107 and 0.0225, i - z > 0.69, and i-band magnitude < 17.46.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.petroR50_r, p.petroR90_r, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z BETWEEN 0.0107 AND 0.0225 AND (p.i - p.z) > 0.69 AND p.i < 17.46

instruction: Find galaxies within 6.24 arcminutes of RA=175.599 and DEC=20.692 with g - r > 0.85 and redshift < 0.101.

SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM fGetNearbyObjEq(175.599, 20.692, 0.104) AS n
JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON p.objID = n.objID
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.85 AND s.z < 0.101

instruction: Find AGN candidates with subclass indicating AGN and g - r color above 0.46, limited to redshift < 0.383.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, s.subClass, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' AND s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.383 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.46

instruction: Find galaxies in a rectangular region from RA=153.3182 to 154.1392 and DEC=-4.2264 to -3.8214, with redshift < 0.123 and g - r > 0.74.
output:
SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM PhotoObj AS p
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.123
AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.74
AND p.ra BETWEEN 153.3182 AND 154.1392
AND p.dec BETWEEN -4.2264 AND -3.8214

SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM fGetNearbyObjEq(112.9828, 42.1099, 0.189) AS n
JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON p.objID = n.objID
JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID
WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.45 AND s.z < 0.167

instruction: Find galaxies with redshift < 0.165 and g - r color greater than 1.04.
output: SELECT p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z, p.err_u, p.err_g, p.err_r, p.err_i, p.err_z FROM SpecObj AS s JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.class = 'GALAXY' AND s.z < 0.165 AND (p.g - p.r) > 1.04

instruction: Find AGN host galaxies with redshift < 0.2 and high concentration index.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z < 0.2 AND (p.petroR90_r / p.petroR50_r) > 2.6 AND (s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' OR s.subClass LIKE '%BROADLINE%')

instruction: List galaxies likely hosting AGN with red g − r > 0.8 and z < 0.15.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE (p.g - p.r) > 0.8 AND s.z < 0.15 AND (s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' OR s.subClass LIKE '%BROADLINE%')

instruction: Retrieve compact galaxies with z < 0.07 and r-band magnitude < 17 for JWST proposal.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z < 0.07 AND p.r < 17 AND (p.petroR90_r / p.petroR50_r) > 2.6

instruction: Select galaxies suitable for spectroscopy with clean photometry and z between 0.01 and 0.05.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.05 AND (p.flags & dbo.fPhotoFlags('SATURATED')) = 0

instruction: Which galaxies with type = 3 have extinction_g < 0.1 and redshift < 0.1?
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE p.type = 3 AND p.extinction_g < 0.1 AND s.z < 0.1

instruction: Get galaxies in a 0.25 degree radius around RA=185, DEC=20 with z < 0.05.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z < 0.05 AND p.objID IN (SELECT objID FROM dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(185.0, 20.0, 0.25))

instruction: Find red AGN host galaxies with g − r > 1.0 and z < 0.1.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE (p.g - p.r) > 1.0 AND s.z < 0.1 AND (s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' OR s.subClass LIKE '%BROADLINE%')

instruction: Show galaxies with high concentration and low extinction for imaging.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE (p.petroR90_r / p.petroR50_r) > 2.6 AND p.extinction_r < 0.1

instruction: Retrieve type 3 galaxies with redshift < 0.1 and bright in r-band.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE p.type = 3 AND s.z < 0.1 AND p.r < 18

instruction: List AGN with extinction_g < 0.15 and located near RA=200, DEC=25.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE p.extinction_g < 0.15 AND (s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' OR s.subClass LIKE '%BROADLINE%') AND p.objID IN (SELECT objID FROM dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(200.0, 25.0, 0.3))

instruction: Which AGN host galaxies are bright in z-band and compact in structure?
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE p.z < 18 AND (p.petroR90_r / p.petroR50_r) > 2.8 AND (s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' OR s.subClass LIKE '%BROADLINE%')

instruction: Select galaxies with redshift between 0.03 and 0.08 and low r-band extinction.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z BETWEEN 0.03 AND 0.08 AND p.extinction_r < 0.1

instruction: Show AGN galaxies with clean photometry and redshift below 0.2.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE (p.flags & dbo.fPhotoFlags('SATURATED')) = 0 AND s.z < 0.2 AND (s.subClass LIKE '%AGN%' OR s.subClass LIKE '%BROADLINE%')

instruction: Give me nearby galaxies suitable for ALMA follow-up with r < 17 and z < 0.05.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z < 0.05 AND p.r < 17

instruction: Find type 3 galaxies that are compact and red, with low redshift.
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE p.type = 3 AND (p.g - p.r) > 0.9 AND (p.petroR90_r / p.petroR50_r) > 2.7 AND s.z < 0.07

instruction: Which galaxies within 0.15 degrees of RA=160, DEC=22 have redshift < 0.1 and type = 3?
output: SELECT TOP 100 p.objID, p.ra, p.dec, s.z AS redshift, p.u, p.g, p.r, p.i, p.z FROM PhotoObj AS p JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.bestObjID = p.objID WHERE s.z < 0.1 AND p.type = 3 AND p.objID IN (SELECT objID FROM dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(160.0, 22.0, 0.15))
